name: Speed Runner (AshonWilley)
description:
This game is a revamped version of my first one. Throughout this project I tried to keep the same type of shit that was from my last game, but eventually some things had to change.

Link To First Game: Speed Runner Download (itch.io)

Please if you have any ideas for this game put them in the comments so I can read them. Thank you for reading this!
